name: Blubber & Crumb
description: Locals swear the food is better if you cry while ordering.
about: Locals swear the food is better if you cry while ordering.

name: The Sock Exchange
description: Open 24/7 except on days that end in ‘y’.
products: left socks, mismatched dreams, and static electricity
about: Open 24/7 except on days that end in ‘y’.

name: Krumplehorn Mechanics
description: Free earplugs with every repair.
products: vehicles that go backwards when you brake
about: Free earplugs with every repair.

name: Waffle Oracle
description: All prophecies come with syrup.
about: All prophecies come with syrup.

name: Moody Gnome Studios
description: The gnomes glare if you haggle.
products: emotional garden statues and passive-aggressive windchimes
about: The gnomes glare if you haggle.

name: Crankle & Bop
description: Specialists in instruments nobody requested.
products: musical spoons, dramatic tambourines, jazz wind
about: Specialists in instruments nobody requested.

name: Granny's Sneezing Powder Emporium
description: Guaranteed to ruin silence.
products: sneeze glitter, scented confusion, itchy mysteries
about: Guaranteed to ruin silence.

name: The Toad Bakery
description: Every 7th loaf explodes (for luck).
products: lumpy bread and emotionally unstable scones
about: Every 7th loaf explodes (for luck).

name: Chair Whisperers Inc.
description: Also offers couple’s therapy for sofas.
about: Also offers couple’s therapy for sofas.

name: Bumblebelly Ink
description: Their bestsellers are banned by logic.
description_short: Their bestsellers are banned by logic.

name: Sir Poke-a-Lot's Petting Zoo
description: Visitors must sign a giggle waiver.
description_short: Visitors must sign a giggle waiver.

about: Visitors must sign a giggle waiver.

name: The Flap & Wiggle Theatre
description: No refunds. Ever.
about: No refunds. Ever.

name: Teacup Engineering Ltd.

about: ISO certified in nonsense since 1987.

name: Myrtle’s Suspicious Soup
description: Mystery guaranteed, ingredients not.
about: Mystery guaranteed, ingredients not.

name: Pants & Philosophy
description: Buy one pair, get an identity crisis free.

about: Buy one pair, get an identity crisis free.

name: The Department of Lost Echoes
description: Echoes recycled ethically and with flair.
about: Echoes recycled ethically and with flair.

name: Whisker Bazaar
description: Facial hair sold by temperament.
about: Facial hair sold by temperament.

name: Tinkle & Snort Plumbing
description: Every leak is a musical opportunity.
about: Every leak is a musical opportunity.

name: Lumpy’s Cloud Storage
description: May rain when opened.
about: May rain when opened.

description: Every dish comes with a story (and a helmet).
description_short: Every dish comes with a story (and a helmet).
about: Every dish comes with a story (and a helmet).

name: Professor Quibble’s Hatorium
description: The hats choose you.
about: The hats choose you.

description: The only spa where slippers bite back.
description_short: The only spa where slippers bite back.
about: The only spa where slippers bite back.

name: The Slightly Haunted Hardware Store
description: Ask for Greg. He might be a ghost.
description_short: Ask for Greg. He might be a ghost.
about: Ask for Greg. He might be a ghost.

name: Snailmail Speedways
description: Guaranteed delivery within one lunar cycle.
description_short: Guaranteed delivery within one lunar cycle.
